events.message: The customer reported an auto accident that occurred yesterday involving their vehicle hitting a pole at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and accident description.
An agent specializing in auto insurance claims has been assigned to handle this case and communicate with the customer.
The claim acknowledgement was sent to the customer promptly to confirm the start of the claims process.
The customer was requested to provide photos of the damaged car and the official police report for further investigation.
The customer has submitted all requested documents, including the police report and multiple images of the vehicle damage.
The investigation team has started reviewing the submitted evidence and contacted witnesses mentioned in the claim.
Investigation completed; the incident was confirmed as a single-vehicle collision causing moderate damage to the car.
A settlement offer outlining repair costs and compensation has been prepared and sent to the customer for review.
The customer responded positively expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and the handling of the claim so far.
Management approved the claim settlement after confirming all documentation and evaluations were complete and accurate.
The payment for the approved auto accident claim was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account without delay.
The claim has been officially closed in the system following successful payment and customer confirmation of receipt.
All case files and documents related to this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
